headline: Exclaimer Increases Forecast Accuracy and Streamlines Sales Team Performance with Gong
summary: Gong, the Revenue AI company, today announced that Exclaimer, a leader in enterprise email-signature management software, has adopted the Gong Revenue AI Platform to enhance sales forecasting, streamline enablement, and align go-to-market teams around a single source of customer insight to drive success.

headline: TransUnion says 4.4 million consumers' data compromised in hack
summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -Credit bureau TransUnion said Thursday that more than 4 million people's data was exposed in a recent hack involving an unidentified third party.  In a letter dated earlier this week and posted to the website of Maine's attorney general, the company said it had "recently experienced a cyber incident involving a third-party application serving our U.S. consumer support operations."  In a statement, TransUnion said it had "quickly contained the issue, which did not involve our core credit database or include credit reports."

headline: This Week In E-Commerce - Off-Peak Seasons Transform Shopping Dynamics and Tax Compliance
summary: Recent findings from a Vertex Commerce study reveal that off-peak seasons are becoming new periods of high activity for the e-commerce sector, with consumers beginning summer shopping as early as late winter. As these shopping trends evolve, primarily driven by economic concerns such as price hikes and product availability, the need for smart tax technology becomes imperative to cope with the complexities of product compliance. The shift from traditional shopping seasons to these newly...

headline: Is Now the Right Time for Salesforce Amid Genesys Investment Talks?
summary: When you’re holding or considering Salesforce stock, the question on your mind is simple: is this the right time to buy, sell, or just wait it out? It’s no secret that Salesforce has kept investors on their toes lately. The stock saw a mild lift of 1.5% over the past 7 days, but that comes after a 7.4% slide in the last month and a year-to-date drop of 24.3%. That sort of swing can make even the most seasoned investors second-guess their instinct. At the same time, Salesforce’s longer-term...
